snippet: For the second time in 14 months, the N.H.L. is out with plan to better balance its conferences. But some of the issues that scuttled the initial proposal remain.
abstract: For the second time in 14 months, the N.H.L. is out with plan to better balance its conferences. But some of the issues that scuttled the initial proposal remain.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

headline.main: Players May Again Reject N.H.L. Realignment Plan
